column4: hello, I'm having a little trouble with the nVidia-glx driver on 7.04 on my Dell C840.  I got X to start correctly, but a block on the right of the screen displays vertical lines, and a block on the bottom redisplays the top of the desktop.
How do I make the desktop be on the entire screen like it was with the nv driver?
What do you mean by on the entire screen?
Well, right 1.5 inches just has vertical lines, and the bottom 1.2 inches just shows the top of the desktop again
